content: GC 22 Gas can Gas can for use with the GX 120 gas nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Maximizes the performance and reliability of your Hilti GX 120 nailers High-pressure gas can – for better reliability in lower temperatures and higher altitudes Applications Compatible with the GX 120 gas-actuated fastening tool Fastening with the GX 120 ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): GX 120, GX 120-ME Substances contained: i-buthene, propene, propane Storage temperature - min.: 41 °F Technical Data | For use with (tools) | GX 120, GX 120-ME | Substances contained | i-buthene, propene, propane | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F ### ITEMS- 38867 - Gas canister GC 22 - Package Size 1 pc
